      • scanForBlocks

        public boolean scanForBlocks(double endingAngle,
                    java.lang.Double cornerX,
                    java.lang.Double cornerY)
        Keeps rotating the robot until the USS either detects a block or the scan is complete
        Parameters:
        endingAngle - angle the robot should stop scanning at
        cornerX - the x coordinate of the corner you are searching
        cornerY - the y coordinate of the corner you are searching

      • getBlock

        public void getBlock(double endingAngle,
            double angleOfBlock,
            java.lang.Double cornerX,
            java.lang.Double cornerY)
        Approach the block and check if it is a wooden or foam block, if it is a wooden block go back and continue scanning for blocks if it is a blue block, pick it up and place or stack it
        Parameters:
        endingAngle - the angle the robot should stop scanning at
        angleOfBlock - the angle where the robot detected an object
        cornerX - the x coordinate of the corner you are searching
        cornerY - the y coordinate of the corner you are searching
